en: Jehovah saith unto my Lord, Sit thou at my right hand, Until I make thine enemies thy footstool.
hmr: LALPA chun ka Lalpa kuomah, “I hmêlmahai i ke innghatnaa ka siem hmakhat chu, Ka changtieng ṭhung rawh,” a tih a.

en: Jehovah will send forth the rod of thy strength out of Zion: Rule thou in the midst of thine enemies.
hmr: LALPA chun i hrâtna hmawl chu Zion tlânga inthawkin tir suok a tih; Nangin nangma dotuhai laia chun rorêl rawh.

en: Thy people offer themselves willingly In the day of thy power, in holy array: Out of the womb of the morning Thou hast the dew of thy youth.
hmr: I mihai chu i thilthawtheina nia chun mâni nuomthuin an inpêk hlak a, Inthieng mawinaah, zîngkâr phîng sûnga inthawkin, I tleirâwl daidaw chu i nei a.

en: Jehovah hath sworn, and will not repent: Thou art a priest for ever After the order of Melchizedek.
hmr: LALPA chun ṭawng ân khâm a, inlêt ta naw nih, “Nang chu Melkizedek um dân anga, Chatuon Thiempu i nih ie,” tiin.

en: The Lord at thy right hand Will strike through kings in the day of his wrath.
hmr: LALPA i changtienga um chun, A lunginsen nia chun lalhai sât bawng rem rum a tih.

en: He will judge among the nations, He will fill the places with dead bodies; He will strike through the head in many countries.
hmr: Hnam tin lai chun rorêl a ta, Hmunhai chu ruongin suksip a ta, Ram tamtaka chun lu chu sât khawi rem rum a tih.

en: He will drink of the brook in the way: Therefore will he lift up the head.
hmr: Lampuia vadunga tui chu dâwn a ta, Chu lei chun a lu chu dawm sâng a tih.
